constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Name: Kingston Hill and Park Road
CONARA Name: Park Road Conservation Area
LOCCEN Name: Kingston Hill and Park Road

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Conditions 4 (Construction Management Plan) of permission 22/00864/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required by condition 4 (Construction Management Plan) of permission 22/00864/FUL (Demolition of the existing building and erection of a three-storey building to provide nine residential units (Use Class C3) and 315 sqm of commercial (Class E) floorspace with associated refuse/recycling facilities and cycle storage)
site_name: Bathstore192 London RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 6QP
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
